name: Air Craft Wars 2017
description:
Something is going on at Area 51. It seems that the enemies broke into the base and want to steal the biggest secrets of the country!

You have been selected for the most important air mission! Pilot the airplanes and defeat the crooks!

Overfly the desert on your new fighter aircraft and don´t stop shooting until there is no airplane alive but yours.

Dodge, fly hard, and avoid the attacks from the enemies airplanes.

There are only two options: or the good ones win, or the evil force gets the crown. It´s on you to become a hero as an airplane pilot!

Are you ready for the biggest battle ever? Will your airplane be a bunch of scrap metal or the next hero? Try it now!

Twitter: @LabCave
Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
